website_summaries.verdict: Offers a blend of spaciousness and practicality in an innovative design. If you are looking for a litter pan with features that work for both cats and owners, this is the one to choose.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for the triangular construction that fits nicely in corners and takes up a bit less space than a standard pan
High walls help keep messes to a minimum
Suitable for large felines and multi-cat homes
cons: Some waste will stick to the surface
The downside of the corner-hugging shape is that the corners of the pan are challenging to clean

customer_reviews.title: Big and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these litter boxes after having several of the standard sized ones over the years. These are big and durable, and it's blatantly obvious that less litter escapes the boxes than before. What else could I ask of a litter box?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Flumen

customer_reviews.title: Epic. Litter. Box.
customer_reviews.text: Look at the giant litter box! I can fit my two cats, and a third if I want! I always had two boxes, but my two cats are perfectly happy with this one giant box. Look at my litter genie for a size comparison! Both my cats have gi issues and this box keeps the projectile poop from escaping on bad days. And easy to clean off these sides. Higher sides than any box I’ve had that doesn’t include a lid. They seem to love it... but not as much as I do. Also, it comes in an extremely large box that is dang sturdy. See cat for size.
customer_reviews.author: Ariss McKalynn

customer_reviews.title: No more BIG mess!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fat Cat has a tendency to spread his litter fast and far! This BIG, high-sided litter box has helped to keep the litter box area much cleaner. Fat Cat is able to do all of his business inside the box. The corner feature is nice too!! You can see the before and after pics attached...
customer_reviews.author: Shen

customer_reviews.title: Great cat box!!
customer_reviews.text: This cat box is very well designed. When I adopted my kittens when they were about 4 weeks old, they got acclimated to the cat box really quickly. Only problem was they were flinging litter out of the box because they scratched around so aggressively. This box solved all those issues and with it designed to fit in the corner, saves a little space in my laundry room where I have all their litter stuff set up along with the Litter Genie pail. The sides are high enough that even with their habit of scratching like there's no tomorrow, they don't fling litter over the sides. Worth the extra money of a "normal" cat box.
customer_reviews.author: ERJ Driver

customer_reviews.title: Urine gets stuck in corners
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this litter box, but it is such a pain to clean. The three corners are pretty 'sharp' and not very rounded, so it is very, very difficult to get any urine clumps out of the corners. It has nothing to do with the litter used, because I have the same issue every single time.
customer_reviews.author: californiakisses

customer_reviews.title: Good Size for Ragdoll Cat
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized litter box that gives plenty of room for my Ragdoll. I like the higher sides which help keep the litter in. It has a nice, smooth surface that makes cleaning and scooping very easy. This is my second one. I love that it fits nicely in a corner and I made a wooden box to put it in which also helps keep the litter scatter contained. Great price on Amazon too. Much better than in the stores. My favorite litter box out of all I've tried. It works the best for me and my kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy- cat urine seeps through the litter and the box and ruins your floors!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these and the size is great, but in both cases we’ve had cat urine on our floor or on the mat underneath the box due to small cracks. I wish I could get my money back, because this is horrible. I read the reviews and thought maybe it was a fluke and blamed my poor kitties for months when in fact we had two faulty boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: COLOSSAL CAT POOPER BOX
customer_reviews.text: I have to warn you this thing is epic. When I saw the box on my porch I thought surely there was a mistake. It was the one thing I didn’t measure. I could fit multiple cats in here all at once. It’s GINORMOUS. There isn’t a lid so if you don’t mind seeing cat logs in full view then it’s all good. I didn’t realize it but there’s something in the plastic that makes a poop not stink HOWEVER it stinks when they are cranking one out naturally :/
customer_reviews.author: Kris Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: walls are too high
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would have a lowered area for the cats to get in but, the walls are very high. The entrance area is high too. The cats don't prefer this over their other one. They pretty much avoid this one.
customer_reviews.author: S King

customer_reviews.title: Good product but hard to remove labels
customer_reviews.text: I like the litter box and it’s size. No problems with the litter box but the label was nearly impossible to remove. They put two labels with adhesive on the box. One on the inside is large and almost impossible to remove. When you finally get the label off there is adhesive left on the plastic. The only way I was able to remove it was with packing tape picking up the adhesive from the plastic. The manufacturer needs to rethink how to label the product. Trying to remove the label left scratches on the plastic. Leaving the label was not an option as it would have absorbed urine. That was why only 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Bought several
customer_reviews.text: Our cats LOVE this style of litterbox. We had bought one for a popular litterbox spot for our four resident cats. They loved it so much we bought several more and now, even our foster cats use this. It results in less litter getting tracked about, less gross "wiping paw on the wall" moments, and less overshooting. Would (and probably will) buy again. Even our worst cat, who regularly pees outside the box, uses this box instead of being the trash monster she usually is.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Saved my bathroom from the urine smell!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my two cats who share a litter box. They were previously using a covered box and my bathroom would constantly smell like urine. One of my cats urinates standing and she was spraying the outside of the box. I found this beauty and ordered it after reading the reviews. What a difference! It is big and roomy and open which is a benefit for the cats. It took away the smell and the walls are high enough to keep everything inside.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza A

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the BEST litter box
customer_reviews.text: Love these Large size litter boxes for our two cats. Solved the problem of needing to protect the walls and wood floor in my closet. We do not have a basement, so we had to use a closet in my home office for the kitties. We hung curtains so that it looked less litter-y. :) Litter scoops out more readily. Less sticking to the bottom. The whole design just works well. Very little debris is scattered on the ground. Only from their paws. Less maintenance. Good looking too! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Ranft

customer_reviews.title: Good large litter pan
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a number of these over the years. I only replaced them as they are plastic and eventually they get too saturated with stink. I love the fact that it is a corner litter pan, which means it’s big enough for my Maine Coon yet doesn’t have a large footprint. It is sturdy and holds quite a bit of litter. The sides are high enough that my cats don’t kick out half the litter in the box (something they do with other boxes). I’ll keep buying these as long as they are available.
customer_reviews.author: KittyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box and a happy cat
customer_reviews.text: My other two piece high-sided litter box became so inadequate even for one senior cat. This corner cat box is amazing. My cat has plenty of room to turn around without hitting his face, plenty of area to do his business, and the angled step-in means that even when he's a second late to the litter box the pee still stsys in the box. The interior walls are nice and slippery which makes cleaning even the toughest clumps very easy. The litter box is large! But that's good if like me you have a senior cat who's very particular, or multiple cats
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully for my Four Large Cats
customer_reviews.text: I use one litter box for my four cats. I've tried to used smaller types and change them out once a week. I've used the type with the lids, the type you roll over and the dirty litter separates from the clean litter.... I've tried the bags you put over the littler box... I was about to buy one of the more expensive metal boxes, but I decided on this one. I love that the sides are SO HIGH. I have cats over 15lbs, so they can make a mess. This box also fits nicely in a corner, so it seems to take up less space. I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: CEE

customer_reviews.title: Love the high sides.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but unfortunately, my cat doesn't. I think the shape is throwing him off. Usually, he has designated sections in a rectangular litter box: pee on one side, poo on the other. But he hasn't figured out how to organize this new shape yet and has been peeing on the floor. But that's not the litter boxes fault. My cat needs to get it together. This litter box has high sides so the cat won't miss the box or push litter out when they are digging around. My cat is 22lbs and pretty long, and this is a great size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Black

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, and very large!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I rescued a bonded pair of cats after my beloved older cat died. It's perfect for the room, and the cats. It fits into the corner of the cat room, holds lots of litter, and is easy for the cats to enter and exit. It holds enough litter that even my daily scooping of their prodigious young-cat eliminations leaves plenty behind so I don't have to add to it every day. And even the clumps by the sides are easy to scoop. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice large litter box with tall sides
customer_reviews.text: We adopted two brothers as kittens, and they quickly outgrew the starter litter pan that we'd gotten. They have been sharing this wonderful huge litter box that we keep in a corner in the bathroom. We've had no problem with litter being tossed out as they dig, and nice tall sides keep all the waste in. By the way - we love "World's Best Cat Litter, Clumping Litter Formula for Multiple Cats" - made of corn plants, naturally sweet scented, clumps easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for messy cats
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who pees on the side of the box and another cat who likes to scratch and get litter all Over. This helps with both problems. I don’t have to have as much litter clean up outside the box with the scratching litter cat and I don’t have to deal with urination outside the box with the other cat. It is easy to clean and not heavy when empty. I use slider litter and nothing rarely gets stuck in the bottom. Litter is way to scoop out.
customer_reviews.author: Janel MH

customer_reviews.title: Meh.....could be better, but not the worst one out there
customer_reviews.text: Two complaints: 1) although it is supposed to be non-stick so it cleans easily, it comes with stickers on the both the inside and outside that take a stick of dynamite to get off - used goo gone and alcohol and it still has a sticky residue that causes litter to cake and stick so the non-stick surface is pointless. 2) side walls need to be a little higher, my kitty will stand at the end of peeing for some reason and it goes over the top edge. Pros: It is a good size though and fits nicely in the corner to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is HUGE!!! I actually bought this for my ferret, and holy cow it’s about 5/6x bigger than his other Marshall’s high back litter pan (my bad!). I gave it to my cat instead the sides are super tall and your cat is so much less likely to kick litter out. I threw out an old covered litter pan and am happily using this instead! But yeah...WAY too big for a ferret or other small animal! This is definitely for cats!
customer_reviews.author: amigcoffee

customer_reviews.title: sticker CANNOT be removed making pan impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: The sticker on the bottom of the pan WOULD NOT PEEL OFF. So at the first cleaning of the pan I had a sticky mess on the sticker that was hard clean off. Still, that sticker would not come off. If not for the sticker I would have given this pan a five-star rating. Other than where the sticker was the rest of the pan was easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Williams

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I saw these at my local animal shelter and wondered why it had taken me so long to find them. If you're looking for the most utilitarian pet products, visit your local shelter -- they've surely got it figured out. The entry is scooped but not super low - so not necessarily great for an older cat, a kitten, or a cat with mobility issues -- but perfect for an agile adult cat. Don't fuss with those boxes with the screens in the bottom -- they're just a mess. keep it simple.
customer_reviews.author: FF

customer_reviews.title: before you buy make sure the entire bottomis smooth
customer_reviews.text: It could of been perfect except there is a flaw at the bottom which makes cleaning up the litter a chore.There is something that sticks up so when you are trying to scoop the litter,you have to stop and start again.If I didn't need the litterbox I would of returned it but I had thrown the old one away.This is something that shouldn't be. I hope somebody will look into this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Kosegi

customer_reviews.title: Big stickers all over them
customer_reviews.text: These litter boxes work well, however, the worst part about them are the very sticky large stickers right on the front and inside the pan on the bottom. I'm now soaking two of the new pans I got after working on them for half an hour trying to remove the stickers without luck. You need a solvent to remove them which I do not have. It's ridiculous to cover products with sticky labels that do not come off easily. I HATE THIS! Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry designer, artist and gardener

customer_reviews.title: A solid box at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten was somehow kicking a few turds out of her old box so we needed something taller. This box is perfect for our needs and she didn't mind the change at all. -I just did my first weekly cleaning of the box and I didn't have to scrub anything off. - my only complaint is like the other reviews said, the plastic isn't as thick as most other boxes, so I could totally see how these would break if you're not too careful. But since I was able to pick this up off of Amazon for about 12 bucks, you can't beat the value!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Best liter box ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it fits in the corner and the height prevents my 3 cats from kicking litter everywhere! The size is excellent and I was able to go from 2 liter boxes to just this one. It is roomy, durable, easy to scoop and does NOT leave a hard, cement like paste on the bottom from urine. I am a neat freak and I am thrilled with this box! Wish I had discovered this one years ago! My cats, ages 1 year and 2 years, adjusted immediately to their new bathroom. This is a definite thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. G. Salgado

customer_reviews.title: This is a great litter pan for larger cats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great litter pan for larger cats. I wasn’t sure if it would fit under my sink (the only option for me) in my bathroom due to my water piping being so close to the floor, but it fit perfectly and for the first time my big boy can use it w/o getting poo on the floor AND he covers his stuff up completely which he didn’t do before, reiterating this pan works great for large cats. He’s Mainecoon and 25lbs at least. I recommend this to anyone w similar pet and space problem . Bought a corner litter mat to go along with it and it’s a perfect setup.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Uptain

customer_reviews.title: Was able to eliminate multiple litter boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 cats and they refuse to have 3 separate litter boxes. They end up guarding their favorites and destroying the other 2 boxes or getting in fights with each other. Once I found this one that was large enough to accompany my 30 lb cat (he’s not fat he’s just a big boy, think scaled up version of a cat) then I knew the others would have no problem and it’s been bliss ever since.
customer_reviews.author: ManWithThePlan

customer_reviews.title: Great size, shape, entry point but removing the stickers sucks
customer_reviews.text: Great size, entry point is low enough for an 8 month cat, holds a lot of litter and I like the corner configuration. My single issue is with the two stickers, one on the inside bottom and other on the outside right of the entry point. Could they make them any more difficult to remove? They are ionically bonded to the plastic with some sort of epoxy glue and they only come off in shreds. It's a litter box guys, not the latest anti-cancer monoclonal antibody.
customer_reviews.author: RolidnotTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Contains litter better than any I have tried before while not taking up as much space.
customer_reviews.text: I love this- it keeps littler contained much better than the others that I have tried. Still comes out on her paws as she walks out but that is easier to clean as well. The others had a high enough “lip” that she could perch over and miss the box totally- not possible with this style. I was concerned about her being able to climb in easily at 17 she’s not as spry as before but stepped in without a problem. I love it and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Christy

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! Your kitty will thank you with many HeadBoops
customer_reviews.text: This is a great litter box for small spaces, and for kitties who like to DIG DIG DIG. The high corners cat the per from my Mini-Panther. We tried the EXPENSIVE CatGenie self flushing and cleaning catbox, and had awful troubles. Great paired with a litter genie to contain the smells, and a low dust cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Normal

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a small male cat who is really still a baby and its huge! I cant even see a full size cat in this. My mistake that I didnt read the description for sizing. Returned it. That said, it probably would have been ok if my little guy was bigger but this just wasnt for me, hence I'll give 4 stars cuz really how can you go wrong with a high cornered box.
customer_reviews.author: IW31

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered another
customer_reviews.text: This is finally the litter pan I’ve looked for all my kitty owning life (60+ years)! Besides high sides for my neurotic spraying old man kitty, there’s high sides for my manical litter shooting young man kitty. Fits neatly in a corner, is easy to clean with barely slanting sides, and because it's triangular the corners are wider and easier to scrape out. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: desertwiffie

customer_reviews.title: Not for kittens
customer_reviews.text: Waaaay bigger and deeper than I thought it would be i wanted a small corner litter box because I have a kitten. My poor baby she could basically sleep in it (he doesn’t) 😂. When he gets bigger I guess it’ll be good for him. But it’s what i wanted just built for fat cats or multi cats. Time will tell. The plastic itself is good and sturdy. Like I said I wish it was smaller
customer_reviews.author: syani

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t your pet need a 💜 shaped litter box?
customer_reviews.text: Love the high sides so nobody can pee over the edges! I have to admit I bought the first one for my pair of bonded bunnies because I thought it kind of looked heart shaped! 🤣 Turned out to be a very smart purchase! I bought 3 more for my other rabbits! They are nice and roomie. Buns like to lay in their boxes on top of the hay. And they are very easy to clean. They have a no-stick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Durable, nice litter box
customer_reviews.text: I love that this litter box fits in a corner and takes up less space but yet it's bigger than my old litter box. My cat obviously already loves it and I don't even have the litter in it yet. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great size litter box.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my fourth of these corner litter boxes. Great size as I have two cats. They are easy to clean and maintain. My cats are diggers and the high sides keep in the litter most of the time. Great price. I really like these litter boxes. They are three times the cost in other pet supply stores. Came in a nicely fit box. I recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Gricar

customer_reviews.title: Great for LARGE cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is large and a bit messy in a little box. I was sweeping and cleaning around his previous boxes all the time. This box is HUGE! It has high sides and plenty of room for him to do his business. I have a little catching mat at the entrance and that's all I need. I don't know if it's the size or what but the smell and odor from his box has decreased immensely since we switched it out for this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, questionable cats
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is a good cat box, but it didn't work for us. I have 3 cats, and normally used a large clear storage box for a cat box. I bought this because of the high sides, as one of the cats likes to scratch until he has kicked litter out of the box. The problem is not the box, more likely one of my cats, who seemed to like to pee right at the lower side where the cats have to walk into the box. This made them not want to use the box and they would pee outside the box. We decided to go back to the storage box.
customer_reviews.author: laura neuner-fischer

customer_reviews.title: A beast
customer_reviews.text: Don't let this pic fool you...this thing is a monster! We have 2 full blooded mom and daughter Norwegian forest cats which are the size of Main Coons. We also have a full blood Manx who is the son. They can fit in this litter box together...2 of them. I have been looking for a big litter box like this forever it seems and this gets it done! I'm praying that with this i wont have to sweep the laundry room 10 times a day. The only color is black and its gonna show dust I'm sure. We use Tidy Cat 24/7 and a whole container is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary.."My Two Cents"

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet.
customer_reviews.text: I've literally gone through so many boxes because my cat is a poop Nazi. We have the mat on the wall cause he used to poop to close to it and/or fling it. 😣😭😂 The last box was in a cardboard box to stop litter tracking even though we have that trapping mat which sucks by the way. We also live in a trailer so there is limited space to put the box, so the corner one was perfect. He's a fat boi and this is a bit more roomy than your standard rectangle. Good stuff. He also enjoys the ginormous box it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: glitched

customer_reviews.title: Best Price for the Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement bottom for the whole unit we purchased a few years ago on Amazon. For some reason, the whole unit isn't available on Amazon anymore. The corner litter box is a little bigger than the traditional rectangle size. We like the cats to have room inside because it makes it easier for cleaning. This is a great sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rootes Author

customer_reviews.title: Well made a durable.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat stopped urinating in his old litter box. He would go just next to it. We thought he didn't like the old box and bought this one. It didn't work, but this litter box is strong, durable, well made. I like notch in the front for entering a NB do exiting as the walls are quite high, the odor protection (he still uses it for his other function) and this litter box will last for years if maintained. Very glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box with one drawback.
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is incredible! Super easy to clean and the sides are high enough that my energetic cat that likes to really kick litter around doesn't get it all over the floor anymore. My only gripe is some idiot thought it was a good idea to put a label right in the bottom. And not just any label, but a label with the strongest glue ever made that can't be peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered the “wrong” litter box!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the wrong cat box but glad I did!! My senior cat has started peeing outside the (clean) litter box. But it is funny because only her butt hangs outside the box. So I figured the box was too small. Had a couple of different boxes in my cart trying to decide which would be best. Thought I got another one but I am so glad I got this one instead!! The tall sides are great and the corner shape is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lily19780

customer_reviews.title: High sided for power kickers.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think there is a solution to tracking kitty litter but this big kitty no longer throws it all over. My cat seems to prefer the corners to do his business. This gives him plenty of room to do so. He doesn't bother using the lowered side to enter and exit but it much be helpful for a smaller cat. It cleans up nicely. Usually I spray it down with Nature's Miracle and wipe clean sometimes rinse with the water hose, dry and we are back in business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome litter pan for big cats!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this litter pan. I have a chubby cat who has a lot anxiety issues, and HAS to have a clear sight path when she uses the litter box. This is big enough to give her room while also fitting into a corner nicely to give ME more room 😉 Since getting this box, she hasn’t had any negative bathroom behavior! It’s easy to clean and comes up high enough to prevent litter being kicked out. Love this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend to help with my oversized cat messing over the side of her litter box. This thing is huge! It is sturdy, too...I have lifted it several times to dump out old litter without any cracking or major bending. My cat fits well in it and only messes over the side (on purpose) if I put the box too close to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Corner in the house
customer_reviews.text: My cats approve! This is probably the most popular litter box in the house. They like being in the corner. I like: pointed corner makes it easy to empty & clean; high sides keep the litter sllinger from making a mess; lower entry access in the front. I think I will get another one of these to replace a less popular box. Great for small space as well. It sits in an otherwise useless corner in the laundry room. It is also roomy enough for a 12-14 # cat to maneuver about easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marlie

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this litter box
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -it's a big litter box -my cat is now physically unable to accidentally poop outside the box -less litter on the floor (there's been about 90% less litter that gets kicked out of the box since I've been using it) Cons: -it's a big litter box (make sure to double-check that the space you're putting it in is large enough) -if your cat is old or has mobility issues, it could struggle to get in and out of the box unless you cut the entrance lower
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge litter box! My husband busted out laughing when I removed it from the box, but I’ll tell you what—my fat cat fit right in and stopped going over the side of the litter box. This was an ongoing problem until I came to the realization that he was just too big for a regular size litter box! The sides are nice and high and it dips down at the front so the cat can easily get in and out. It fits nicely into a corner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased...
customer_reviews.text: Overdue response. Fast shipping! I ordered two of these cat boxes, and I am satisfied with them. I find that the litter lasts longer, and I don't have to scoop twice a day to keep fresh boxes. My cats are not kicking the gravel out the box since the sides are high. I wish I knew about these boxes a long time ago. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: nikonjd

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: His is HUGE, it could be used outdoors for a bobcat :) Way too big for what we needed inside of a kennel, there is no way this would fit, I should have paid more attention to the size. I'n really not sure what animal would use this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina McClain

customer_reviews.title: How did I not know about this kind sooner!?
customer_reviews.text: I have had the litter box angled in the corner for years. Every now and then my cat will back all the way up and pee down the corner (like a jerk!). Talk about a horrible smell. This corner box fits perfectly. It’s a large box with higher walls. Takes up less room, less litter on the floor and my cat seems to approve. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Cat's Litter INSIDE the Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: This high-sided litter box was the PERFECT remedy for "Popeye's" (🙀) litter habits...!!! It's not lightweight, instead, it is sturdy and well designed and very easy to clean and keeps you from losing your mind by not having to keep sweeping or vacuuming the immediate area around the litter box. I highly recommend this box...!!!
customer_reviews.author: ''BOBO''

customer_reviews.title: This cat box is keeping my floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats likes to really dig in he box and invariably there would be piles of litter all around the box. The high sides keep him from kicking out so much litter. Much easier to clean it than my old one. It slides out pretty good when I change the litter and doesn't stick to the sides or bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Schays

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: I loved this litter box. It fit in the corner, it was easy to clean, and the sides were high enough that my little olympic high pee'er didnt spray the walls when she had to go. I appreciated the size which was wide enough that it didnt restrict movement or make kitty feel confined. I highly suggest this litter box for any cat.
customer_reviews.author: Piiku

customer_reviews.title: Massive!
customer_reviews.text: First off - this thing is massive. Much bigger than I thought considering all the other boxes I've gotten. This one is big enough both my typical house cats could sleep comfortably in it (but thank god they don't.) The high sides are also a huge blessing. Well worth the steeper price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick becomes stick very quickly, however cat loves the roominess!!
customer_reviews.text: One star off only because the nonstick surface easily gets scratched up and you’ll notice the kitty waste will stick to the bottom. Figured a way around that, added 2-3” of litter, and it sticks less. This is very huge but if you like pampering your feline and have the space, this is the box for you.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Great for large long cats that toss litter around like confetti
customer_reviews.text: I love this style litter box, tucks nicely in the corner and the sides are tall enough to keep the litter from flying everywhere. I have a large Mainecoon and he fits in the box with ample room to decide which corner to desecrate. Box is not flimsy and litter doesn't over stick to the material. this is the second box I have gotten since now I have two cats and they want their own.
customer_reviews.author: A. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be easier to clean and resistant to smells, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This box is excellent size, and appreciably easier to clean and less smelly than the plastic storage boxes I had been using. Sides seem to be high enough - I haven't noticed anything getting out. I still added some corrugated plastic boards against the walls to be extra sure. I liked this box so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ok cat box
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and that it fits in a corner out of the way. my biggest complaint is that this thing is an absolute dust magnet, after the cat uses it each time the walls of the inside and covered in dust and it looks horrible didn't have this problem with the previous litter box
customer_reviews.author: Zak P

customer_reviews.title: My rabbit chewed it
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping my rabbits mess in, the only issue I've had is the lip was a little too high for her preference and she let me know by chewing it down to where she wanted it (about 3-4 inches lower) and so for a while every day I'd have to vacuum up plastic shavings. It does seem to absorb odor better than her past litter containers.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: My cat poops in it. I guess that means she is alright with it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes to poop in corners. This gives her multiple options to choose from. She's a chubby kitty, so the larger size ensures she actually fits as well. I asked her what she thought of it, and she ignored me. I figure that's a "I poop here.. what do you expect, human?" I do use litter liners, the dip in front is kinda a pain, but two binder clips solve that issue pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brian HawksTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My cat only uses this box now!
customer_reviews.text: First of all this thing is huge! When the package came in I thought it was something else because the box was ginormous as well. Anywho, It didn’t fit in the corner where the old litter box was sitting but I don’t care! My cat only uses this box now! I put it side to side with the old litter box and she hasn’t touched the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best litter box
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best litter box, ever. I did quite a bit of research as my Maine Coon baby was piddling outside her box, which was abnormal (took her to the vet, all was fine, it was a behavior issue) so I took the word of one of the ladies that her Maine Coon was upset about her box and switched, and all was fine, and I did, and it was a Maine Coon miracle :) This box is big, and suits Maine Coons obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Deep dish cat box with two giant time-consuming stickers
customer_reviews.text: There are two hard to remove stickers on this triangular deep walled cat box. Add to the cost of the product about 30-45 minutes of your time which you will spend removing these stickers before letting your cat poop and pee on them. The surface is not non-stick for stickers. I don't know why manufacturers insist on giant labels on surfaces which will be used and or seen when in use. This could be solved by putting the sticker on the bottom of the product. Aside from this irritant, this is a fine triangular piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B.

customer_reviews.title: Not low enough for cat to easily get in.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this per a recommendation from a website article that said it would be good for older cats because the entrance is low to the ground. It’s higher than the box I already have and it’s so huge that returning it will be a pain in my butt!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M McNelly

customer_reviews.title: VERY large, but heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than expected. It isn't going to save space like I imagined but is a durable tall litter box. I had to put a quarter of my 38 lb cat litter box into it to fill the bottom. It's OK though, our maincoon kitten will be needing the extra space when she is grown.
customer_reviews.author: J.P,

customer_reviews.title: Love love love the size!
customer_reviews.text: I got this litter box because I now have two cats and this thing is huge! I love the size, with all my other litter boxes my cat would have his front feet perched up on the ledge when he used it but now this one is big enough he has plenty of room to fit entirely in the box. I'd say perfect for two to three cats!
customer_reviews.author: Kalee

customer_reviews.title: Cats seem to like it, great shape and size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for multiple cats and sits in the corner nicely under the sink in the bathroom. Its large, pay attention to the dimensions. I was surprised but it turned out to be the perfect size. Cats jump in and out with no problem. Heavy duty plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Room for the Team
customer_reviews.text: We have four cats, two exceptionally long, one exceptionally fat (AKA the Confirmed Bed Potato) and one whose body is normal (although definitely not her mind.) Amazingly enough, they all like this. It's a back-up only; MY preference will always be the Litter Robot III (and prior versions). Of course, 22 YO One-Eyed Warrior Diva disdains Litter Robot (she's a confirmed naturalist), so back-up required. This one is great; I may use for the grandbaby as well.
customer_reviews.author: Movin' southTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for large cats. that like to bury excessively..
customer_reviews.text: On top of my headline I have one 10lb pound 5 month old that is clumsy and has the habit of tipping over litter pans. This litter pan does not tip with when kept in a corner, Had a high rectangular in the same place and he would tip almost every day. Sturdy quality at a very reasonable price. We will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Mc Connell

customer_reviews.title: Saved my cat's bacon
customer_reviews.text: I have a lazy cat who will step in and pee as soon as her feet are in the litter. The entryway to this litter box curves out, and is relatively high. The end result is that it functions as a collector for both her lazy peeing, and our other cat's frantic litter scratching. The high walls also contain the other cat's propensity to stand while urinating. We'd gone through five or six different boxes before we got this thing, and it's the only one that's worked for us consistently. Simply put, this is a well-designed litter box for cats who are a bit scattershot with their pee habits.
customer_reviews.author: D. Seward

customer_reviews.title: Love this litter box!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kittens who are very busy with their business. Having the "no stick" bottom is great!!! Very easy cleanup and the high sides really help too. The shape is great and makes it easier to place in a room. Definitely would purchase again if needed, however it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: NOT A LOW ENTRY PAN, But Great Corner Pan
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this thinking it will be a low entry pan for an older cat. It's like a 6 inch clearance that towered over my already tall entry pans when I was purchasing new pans. DO get this, however, if you want a really sturdy pan that sits in the corner for cats wanting to feel like they can't be jumped, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Vahn Awakens The Genesis Tree

customer_reviews.title: Great box, but maybe too big for stubby leg cats.
customer_reviews.text: This thing was huge! If I had a regular long-legged cat I would have kept it but my cat is 8yrs old and with short Persian legs. I would've had to get her a tiny staircase to get in & out of it. I sent it back. Because my cat is short.
customer_reviews.author: Magpie

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my 3 cats
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 3 cats. I have a boy cat who's a big guy and this is plenty of room. It fits in the corner which saves space. Also, it gives them a sense of security because cats like to have an open field of vision while they are 'taking care of business', in case they are attacked by another kitty they have an escape route. Love this box.
customer_reviews.author: Trish W.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for large cats and small spaces; excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for large cats and multi-cat households! The corner design is also convenient for small spaces. The high sides have eliminated accidental overspray. I've used a variety of litterboxes with my cats over the past nine years, and this is by far the best in terms of both quality and effectiveness. I also recommend the rectangular version:
customer_reviews.author: CopperBoom

customer_reviews.title: Litter Stays Put!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! All my cats fling litter everywhere, but the sides are so high I only have to chase litter pellets that stick to cat paws. One bad thing is that this is very heavy. It's not an issue for me personally, but this thing is built very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Jo Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Large cat friendly & amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Great shape and depth for my slightly large cat. He seems a lot more comfortable and the litter only comes out at the lip when he really gets to kicking around. I use a mat to catch the litter and have no problem cleaning it out. Lightweight plastic, so don’t fill with heavy litter and pick up by the edges - it would probably break or crack. 5 out of 5 from me and to anyone with a bigger kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Mela M

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than anticipated - perfect for our large cat
customer_reviews.text: We have a large cat, and so this litter box is perfect. Tall enough that litter doesn't get everywhere and fits perfectly into the corner of the room. Our cat fits rather well - the normal litter box sizes she had trouble fitting into, but she's much happier with this one now.
customer_reviews.author: southernbelleinmd

customer_reviews.title: Box is good height and size, fits well in corner
customer_reviews.text: This litter box fits perfectly in the corner of our room. We had the dome litterbox which we liked using so we did not have to look at it. But, our new cat does not like to be in enclosed spaces. So, this was our option. The litter liners made for this box fit well, but they are super thin so you have to double up on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cat-hole approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3yo male, neutered cat decided to start pooping outside the box on purpose... so we tried ALL THE THINGS as recommended by our vet and switching to a large corner box was the last effort. It worked!! He stopped pooping outside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cherry Roe

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Box
customer_reviews.text: I've had this box for years. I use it for two cats and they share it just fine. I bought this because my old box was finally getting harder to clean from all the scratching over the years. I had previously had the covered corner box. That one is more expensive, but this box fits perfectly under the previous lid. Very good price and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LHB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fantastic purchase for us! My cat is a big boy and every now and then he decides he can't be bothered to sit down to do his business... in doing so, he used to leave an awful mess for me to clean up. No longer! Now, even if he feels like standing, everything stays contained.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: my cat doesn't like it because I think she wants to put her ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is not for everyone, I mean cats in general. I hope my cat was able to use it instead of urinating outside. Sadly, my cat doesn't like it because I think she wants to put her paws on the edge of the box, so she can aim for it. She can't use high sided corner because she realizes she can't put her paws on the high sided edge, and was probably afraid she will lose balance, so she pees outside. :( The funny thing is she can poo inside which is no problem, but she can't pee inside. Go figure. I love this box, but my cat doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Scribblingartsy

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20+ pound Maine Coon, who is a bit of a litter-kicker. No problem here. He has plenty of room and most of the litter stays in the box. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DMoore

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my horrible LUUUP boxes with these high-side, corner boxes. These are amazing! I have a goofball cat who likes to do his business as he is climbing the side of his box, which can lead to great big, stinky messes. This box allows him to hoist himself up just a bit, but not enough that his litter box donation is deposited outside the box. The depth of this pan also allows for a large amount of litter to be placed inside; this has led to less scattering of litter as well. I have two of these with two indoor cats (and one indoor/outdoor brathead cat) and I am very happy with the litter box situation.
customer_reviews.author: Living_Lime_Green

customer_reviews.title: Big, roomy, no pee/poo comes out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Buying again after 2 years of use only because I rescued a family of feral kittens and in the process of relocation they couldn't quite figured out how to properly use the litter box, so box is a mess in and out, too lazy to wash and desinfect so Im going to replace it for a new one. My permanent cats like it and I do too.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Produce ruined by label adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: Why would you put a sticker on the inside of the box, over the top of the antimicrobial and so-called easy to clean surface? It took 30 minutes to remove the sticker and I now have adhesive stuck to the surface. What does the company recommend to remove adhesive without damaging antimicrobial surface? PUT THE LABEL IN THE OUTSIDE!!! 😠😡😤
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Foiled my Flinger!
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is really high and the outward slope of the lower opening is a great litter barrier. My cats are real litter flingers and the mess was bugging me so I tried these. They are large and deep and very frustrating to my worst offender. After not being able to fling any out from inside, I watched him stand outside and try to dig litter out of the box and fling it! He worked really hard and couldn't get any out! That's what I wanted. Now we have only the little bit that sticks to their paws. Oh, it might be easier to scoop if the corners weren't rounded, but it's a small thing.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: Best box for homes with multiple cats!
customer_reviews.text: We are a cat family. We direct an animal rescue so not only do we have our own brood but we have guest cats on a regular basis. In or garage we have a giant pile of discarded reject cat boxes. This box is not in that pile. The sides are high enough to catch the back spray and keep the litter from flying out when overly enthusiastic diggers get in there. It is also easy to clean and holds up well when the kids are carrying them in and out of the house for cleaning. I always recommend this box when people ask.
customer_reviews.author: Alden Park

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than it looks in the picture! This is a perfect size and is working well so far (we have 2 cats). The sides are pretty high. It doesn’t catch everything but honestly, I feel our cats dig obsessively and kick up more litter than normal. Overall I like this!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie T

customer_reviews.title: Maine Coon Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only litter box that I’ve had to where the cats have not been able to pee or poop over the edge! I have a Maine Coon that cannot squeeze into most litter boxes comfortably! The only thing that is a pain is the front where it dips down for cats to get in; my big girl sometimes throws the litter outside of the box when covering up her waste.
customer_reviews.author: Artsy

customer_reviews.title: No more accidents spilling over
customer_reviews.text: My cats are getting older and starting to miss the box, so I bought this and it has been a lifesaver! No more accidents because they don't want to squat as much anymore, or wait to pee until the last minute and it sprays over.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hames

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our rabbit
customer_reviews.text: Great for a rabbit. Plenty of room for him to dig and rest and play in his hay without shoveling it all out of his box! Nice high sides means no peeing outside of the box as well. Great to clean. The slightly lower front allows him to hop right in and eat and play.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Love it fir the right space.
customer_reviews.text: Nice high walls, but not so high that cats will not use. Fits in corners and offers plenty of room for cats. But that means it is BIG. Will not fit just anywhere and not in the cage I use for new or sick kitties. Wish they offered a smaller one too.
customer_reviews.author: Dal

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle Advanced High Sided Corner Litter Box (P-5913)
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 1Nature’s Miracle pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 30 years. With the expansion to training aids, cat litter, disinfectants and other products, Nature’s Miracle brand can be trusted to provide innovative solutions to a range of pet problems. 

Nature’s Miracle Advanced High Sided Corner Litter Box has 10 inch walls that contain litter scatter and leaks from spraying. It features a non-stick surface and odor blocking technology. This litterbox also controls odors caused by bacteria with its antimicrobial product protection. The extra-large size is ideal for households that have multiple cats. It is specifically designed to fit into corners, measuring at 23 by 26 inches, allowing more usable space for you! The easy pour spout allows you to clean up after your cat with ease. 

Trust the miracle when finding solutions for a clean home and a happy, healthy pet.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
